https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/j7KilE5raWHR58udQnCacFfr1t7.jpg A UFO is shot down over Russia in the 1970s and the wreckage is taken to a secret research facility. When the Soviet Union collapses, the alien technology falls into the hands of a mysterious terrorist organisation, which uses it to create a devastating doomsday weapon. A team of secret agents is sent to stop the carnage. Cold Fusion
